content.rendered:
This item has a minimum order quantity of 10.

The Hudson Sofa Bed is compact yet a fully functioning double sofa bed! Ideal for where space is limited. Ideal for cosy lodges or compact hotel rooms as well as holiday parks and homes and even places within the healthcare sector, such as hospitals.

The Hudson sofa features a plain and simple design, however it utilises a genius design. 

Shown with custom piping – POA

This is also comes with a 2 year warranty but should last for years to come.
